text: Bindi Hussain (Popularly known: Baby Bindi) is a Bangladeshi film actress. She won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Child Artist for the film Lal Kajal (1982). ==Selected films== * Janata Express (1981) * Lal Kajal (1982) ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Baby Bindi
